original_text: Moses got up from the ground. He went to Dathan and Abiram. The leaders of the Israelites went with him.
korean_text: 모세가 일어나 다단과 아비람에게로 가니 이스라엘 장로들이 따랐더라

sentences.original_text: Moses got up from the ground.
He went to Dathan and Abiram.
The leaders of the Israelites went with him.
